sentences.en: A Spanish judge rejected the suit on procedural grounds.
sentences.cn: 一名西班牙法官以程序理由驳回了该起诉。

sentences.en: The two sides have spent most of their time wrangling over procedural problems.
sentences.cn: 双方花了大部分的时间争论程序上的一些问题。

sentences.en: It may be the judge's fault. It may be a lawyer's fault. It may be a procedural snafu.
sentences.cn: 这可能是法官的错误，或许是律师的问题，也可能是程序上的混乱。
